suncertify.ui
Class ThreadedAction

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.ui.FilterAction
      suncertify.ui.ThreadedAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action
public class ThreadedAction
extends FilterAction

A wrapper for a swing Action which adds the behavior of executing wrapped actions in a separate thread.

Author:
Mohammad S. Abdellatif
